ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: More Japanese grammar, vocabulary, and such. We started using some authentic materials like online websites and animes to supplement lessons :).
Additional skills in all areas of the Japanese language.
speaking writing and listening to japanese
I learned to read, write, and speak Japanese at an advanced level.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Pretty well taught in my opinion. I previously learnt Japanese at a different place and the syllabus is more well structured here in my opinion. Nishimura Sensei is also a very dedicated teacher who gives a lot of thorough feedback. The only 'weakness' is that it is quite a lot of daily work, which can be quite the time-crunch when it coincides with other activities that you may have during certain weeks, but I guess that's true for any language.

Nishimura Sensei's teaching methods are very effective. The breadth of tools she uses keeps students constantly engaged. The homework assigned, though there is a lot, is useful for thoroughly learning the material.
pro: very rigorous, good class dynamic, good teacher con: assignments a bit disorganized, often have to be done on various books/packages which is very inconvenient

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Definitely. Again, Nishimura Sensei's teaching methods are very effective, and anyone who wants to learn Japanese would benefit from this course.
Yes, super good Japanese language class.
